Paints a rectangle at the specified coordinates

Parameters:
rectX - the x-coordinate (absolute to this canvas)
rectY - the y-coordinate (absolute to this canvas)
rectWidth - the width of the rectangle
rectHeight - the height of the rectangle
hexRGB - the color of the rectangle

                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      int hexColor)
Fills a specified area with the specified color

Parameters:
pix - the pixels to manipulate
size - the size of the area that the pixels cover
x - the x-coordinate of the area to fill
y - the y-coordinate of the area to fill
width - the width of the area to fill
height - the height of the area to fill
hexColor - the color to fill
